name: Outer Space Transport Service
description:
Salvage scrap with scrappy piloting, a rope, and a dream.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49. The theme was: Unstable

Controls:

  • Left/Right arrow keys - rotate ship
  • Up arrow key - use thruster
  • Down arrow key - deploy/retract rope
  • R - restart
  • (optional) Shift+D - show debug info
  • (optional) Shift+F - toggle postprocessing
